Attributes.description: Petroleum feed stocks testing methods, pseudocomponents, and property methods. Design and simulation of separation and reaction systems. Steady state and dynamic simulation.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: All of CHBE 345, CHBE 355, CHBE 376.
